text: Sɨvɨla 6.16-17 Sng 76.7, Ais 13.6, Hos 10.8, Jol 2.11, Nah 1.6, Sef 1.14, Mal 3.2, Lu 23.30, CHL 4.2, 4.10, 9.6, 16.14 hɨnihɨni nameŋ abavi uami. Asɨ hula sabaŋ sipsipɨ ninaŋ agaŋ hula hulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlasaŋ igɨvɨ hekɨlɨ hɨniavɨla nulɨdɨ sɨbɨlɨ lamalama hɨsɨŋ mɨhiŋ hekɨlɨ agaŋ ci iahi aba abavi uami. Akɨ hulaŋ agaŋ ahica agɨladɨ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ agadɨ lɨvalavɨla vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lagulamɨbali aba abavi uami. Vana lɨba hekɨlɨ hekɨlɨ agɨlaŋ halu hekɨlɨ hekɨlɨ agɨlaŋ mɨgamɨga aludɨ sɨhɨvia sɨbaŋ hɨsihalavɨci sɨvɨla hɨnibalu aba abavi uami. Sɨvɨla hɨnidamɨli Asɨ nudɨ mɨgahɨnihɨni hɨsɨŋ uvɨ hɨvɨ mɨgahɨnidi agaŋ aludɨ ma igɨbali aba abavi uami. Sabaŋ sipsipɨ ninaŋ agaŋ igɨvɨ hekɨlɨ daŋ vevɨla aludɨ sɨbɨlɨ ma lamɨbali aba abavi uami.
